item.title: Diffusion Modeling based Recommender Systems
item.description: Diffusion Models have exhibited state-of-the-art results in image and audio synthesis domains. A recent line of research has started to adopt Diffusion for recommender systems. This article introduces Diffusion and its relevance to the recommendations domain and also highlights some of the most recent proposals on this novel theme.
